resources.string: 1. What is the name of your first school?
2. What was your favourite food as a child?
3. What is your mother\'s maiden name?
These will be used to re-affirm your identity while resetting your 4-digit PIN. Forgetting of these will lead to loss of your data.
Help us to know your name !
Please set up your 4 digit PIN
If you have forgotten these, there is no way to access your data further.

This Privacy Policy is meant to help you understand what information we collect, why we collect it, and how you can update, manage, export, and delete your information.\n\nBefore you submit any information to this application, please read the Privacy Policy of this application so that you can understand how we will treat your information in a secure manner. If you do not agree to this Privacy Policy, please do not use this application. Your use of any part of this application indicates that you are accepting our Privacy Policy.

To use this application, users would be required to provide certain information which may include, but not limited to:

 1.Username
 2.Three Security Questions
We do not knowingly collect or solicit any information from the people who were more than 5 years older.

This application provides the users with the utmost security in such a way that his/her data will not be exposed to any kind of external medium (e.g.: internet). Whatever the data that this application collects will only be available within the user\'s device itself. Also, the application was equipped with 4-digit security PIN which will keep the data safe from others.

Any questions/clarifications with respect to this policy or any complaints, comments, concerns or feedback can be sent to siva.mal1918@gmail.com or by normal/physical mail addressed to:

Marripalli Village, 
Podalakur Mandal, 
Nellore District, 
Andhra Pradesh. PIN: 524345.
